context_bundle.summary: Automation Value Pyramid: Tier 1 (Foundation) = high volume/low complexity quick wins (data entry, file org, notifications). Tier 2 (Optimization) = multi-step cross-app workflows (approvals, onboarding). Tier 3 (Transformation) = strategic complex processes (predictive analytics, compliance). Start Tier 1 for stakeholder buy-in.

onboarding.quick_start: Tier 1 first (quick wins) -> Tier 2 (demonstrate broader impact) -> Tier 3 (automation maturity achieved). 206% ROI average. 3.2 hrs/day saved per employee.
common_patterns: Error Value = Errors Prevented * Cost Per Error
Quick Win criteria: >10x/week, clear rules, high error rate manual
known_errors: Starting with Tier 3 = high risk, low buy-in
